solution_line_template: From Sunday and Monday, Rachel drinks {sunday_glasses} + {monday_glasses} = <<{sunday_glasses}+{monday_glasses}={sunday_monday_glasses}>>{sunday_monday_glasses} glasses of water
From Tuesday to Friday, Rachel drinks {daily_glasses_tue_fri} * {num_days_tue_fri} = <<{daily_glasses_tue_fri}*{num_days_tue_fri}={tue_fri_glasses}>>{tue_fri_glasses} glasses of water

The total glasses of water she drinks from Sunday to Friday is {sunday_monday_glasses} + {tue_fri_glasses} = <<{sunday_monday_glasses}+{tue_fri_glasses}={total_glasses_sun_fri}>>{total_glasses_sun_fri} glasses of water

The total ounces of water she drinks from Sunday to Friday is {total_glasses_sun_fri} * {ounces_per_glass} = <<{total_glasses_sun_fri}*{ounces_per_glass}={total_ounces_sun_fri}>>{total_ounces_sun_fri} ounces

The ounces of water she should drink on Saturday is {total_ounces_target} - {total_ounces_sun_fri} = <<{total_ounces_target}-{total_ounces_sun_fri}={ounces_needed_saturday}>>{ounces_needed_saturday} ounces

The glasses of water she should drink on Saturday is {ounces_needed_saturday} / {ounces_per_glass} = <<{ounces_needed_saturday}/{ounces_per_glass}={glasses_needed_saturday}>>{glasses_needed_saturday} glasses of water
